title: Aubergine lasagne
ingredients: ['600 g (1 lb 5 oz) aubergines, cut into 5 mm (¼ in) slices', 'Salt and black pepper', '9-12 sheets dried spinach lasagne', 'Olive oil for greasing', '25 g (1 oz) Parmesan cheese, grated', 'For the béchamel sauce', '600 ml (1 pint) skimmed milk', '35 g (1¼ oz) carrots, sliced', '1 shallot, thinly sliced', '1 bay leaf', '1 clove', '1 large sprig of fresh flat-leaved parsley', '12 black peppercorns', '35 g (1¼ oz) 70 per cent fat spread', '35 g (1¼ oz) plain white flour', 'Whole nutmeg for grating', 'For the tomato sauce', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '250 g (9 oz) onions, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '800 g (1 lb 12 oz) canned chopped tomatoes', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '4-6 tablespoons finely shredded fresh basil']
